dataSource.name: pidr_data
dataSource.label: 安硕央评系统接口文件定义
dataSource.describe: 安硕央评系统接口文件定义

column.name: InterRatingRes
column.label: 金融机构内部评级结果

column.name: InterRatinDes
column.label: 金融机构内评体系描述

column.name: PerChaSit
column.label: 近一年主要人员是否发生变动

column.name: DirecortNum
column.label: 董事会成员(执行董事)数量

column.name: LegRepIDType
column.label: 主要负责人身份标识类型

column.name: LegRepWorkingYears
column.label: 主要负责人在本单位从业年限

column.name: InvEntIDType
column.label: 被投资企业身份标识类型

column.name: InvEntIDNum
column.label: 被投资企业身份标识号码

column.name: CurPortionOfNonCurrentAssets
column.label: 一年内到期的非流动资产

column.name: CurPorOfLongTermLiabilities
column.label: 一年内到期的非流动负债

column.name: TotalEquity
column.label: 所有者权益(或股东权益)合计

column.name: TotalEquityAndLiabilities
column.label: 负债和所有者权益(或股东权益)总计

column.name: InvestmentIncome
column.label: 投资收益(损失以“-”号填列)

column.name: AssociatesAndJointVenturesInc
column.label: 其中:对联营企业和合营企业的投资收益

column.name: FinancialAssetsEndIncome
column.label: 以摊余成本计量的金融资产终止确认收益(损失以“-”号填列)

column.name: NetExposureHedgingIncome
column.label: 净敞口套期收益(损失以“-”号填列)

column.name: IncomeFromChangesInFairValue
column.label: 公允价值变动收益(损失以“-”号填列)

column.name: CreditImpairmentLoss

column.name: IncomeFromAssetDisposal

column.name: ProfitBeforeTax

column.name: NetProfit
column.label: 四、净利润(净亏损以“-”号填列)
